Reviews.Title: CCTV CAMERA CABLES
Reviews.Author: JOHNNY MOE
Reviews.Content: Good buy for your money.Video Audio Power 4 X 150 Feet CCTV Security Camera Cables with Free BNC to RCA Connector C32

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready. For camera with DC power only
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
Works for both BNC or RCA connection
BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 Pack 100ft Feet Video Power Cables BNC RCA Security Camera Extension White Wires Cords for CCTV DVR Surveillance System C21
